data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Jhansi words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jhansi, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 21,985 believers in the county of Jhansi.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Jhansi, Uttar Pradesh, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Jhansi to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions) people. Make the Jat Dhariwal (Muslim traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, let the threatened of Jhansi, Uttar Pradesh, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Jhansi. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jhansi, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 1,998,600.

We estimate Jhansi has 21,985 people who might know Jesus, 24,250 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,952,366 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Jhansi are far from Jesus.
